text: Joe Dakota (also known as Spara Joe... e così sia!) is a 1972 Spaghetti Western film directed by Emilio Miraglia. This 1972 movie should not be confused with a 1957 movie of the same name, Joe Dakota (1957 film) directed by Richard Bartlett, starring Jock Mahoney and Luana Patten (plus Lee van Cleef in a minor role). ==Plot== In the 1972 movie, bandits track down a man named Joe who has a map to a fortune of stolen money taken in a bank robbery. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1972 films Category:Italian- language films Category:Spaghetti Western films Category:Italian films
title: Joe Dakota
